triples.name: Personality in animals
triples.relevance: The paper discusses animal personalities as a synonym for individual behavioral variation, a core concept in the field.

triples.name: Behavioral ecology
triples.relevance: Behavioral ecology is the main disciplinary framework for studying individual behavioral variation and is explicitly mentioned in the abstract.

triples.name: Evolution
triples.relevance: Evolution is examined as a key factor in understanding the ecological and evolutionary causes of individual behavioral variation.

triples.name: Behavioral syndrome
triples.relevance: Behavioral syndromes are a closely related framework for understanding correlated behavioral traits that vary among individuals.

triples.name: Animal behaviour
triples.relevance: Animal behavior is the fundamental subject matter of the paper's examination of individual behavioral variation across species.
